overview: In a wild attempt to mix things up, Gianna's husband entrusts Logan to teach her the art of seduction. Ivy, nervous and excited, anxiously awaits her first complete submission experience with another man. Hoping for her husband to step up his love game, Angela invites him to witness her in an extreme bondage fantasy. Kendra learns that even hotwives need to spice things up to keep love and sex exciting.
title: Hotwife Bound 4
